scripts.db:safe-setup: npm run db:safe-setup && npm run load:demo-data

scripts.prod:server: npm run deps:server && npm run build:server
scripts.prod:microservices: npm run deps:user-service && npm run build:user-service && npm run deps:logging-service && npm run build:logging-service
